properties.name: BLACK SHEEP KNITTING CO.
properties.description: Posted by Mrsmat041500 Highland Ave. Needham ma 781-444-0694 781-444-0695 (FAX) 1500 Highland Ave. Needham, MA 02492 BLACKSHEEPKNITTING@VERIZON.NET In downtown Needham. Very friendly sales staff. Nice selection - well organized.

properties.name: Creative Warehouse
properties.description: Posted by Mrsmat04220 Reservoir St. Needham Heights, MA 02494Address: 220 Resevoir Street Riverbend Office Park Needham Heights, MA 02494 Phone: 781 444 9341 Fax: 781 449 6322 E-mail: Creativewarehse@cs.com Winter Hours: Mon. - Sat. 10 - 4:30 Sun 12 - 4:00 Always Closed on Wednesday Great shop. It is packed full of yarn. It can be overwhelming the first time in. They have bins of sale yarns that is a bit of work to look through but has great bargains. They are going to be expanding in 2007/2008.

properties.name: Ewe'll Love It!
properties.description: Posted by Mrsmat04100 main street Nashua nhLovely yarn store in Downtown Nashua NH. Knowledgable staff and lots of yarns to choose from. Great sale loft. Also has classes. 100 Main Street, Suite 4 (in the back of the building) Nashua, NH 03060 603-578-2630 Mon-Sat 10-5 Tuesday and Thursday 10-8 Sundays (Oct - Feb) 12 noon - 4 pm

properties.name: FiberLoft
properties.description: Posted by Mrsmat049 massachusetts ave, harvard, maTHE FIBER LOFT (Bare Hill Studios) 978-456-8669 9 Massachusetts Ave (Rte. 111) www.thefiberloft.com Harvard, Massachusetts 01451 yarn@thefiberloft.com Some gorgeous yarns, including a section of "new fiber blends" (Corn, Soy, Bamboo). Has classrooms upstairs and teach weaving as well as knitting.

properties.name: Harrisville Designs
properties.description: Posted by Mrsmat0441 Main St., Harrisville, nhHarrisville Designs 41 Main St., Post Office Box 806 Harrisville, New Hampshire, 03450 USA Orders: (800) 338-9415 Office: (603) 827-3333 Fax: (603) 827-3335 Very interesting place if you are interested in weaving/spinning as well as knitting.

properties.description: Posted by Mrsmat041282 Washington, W. Newton, MA 02465 Small shop with great yarns.
